column3: Ban on free distribution of tobacco products in the mail or through other means
column5: Ban on non-tobacco goods AND services identified with tobacco brand names
column6: Ban on brand name of non-tobacco products used for tobacco product
column7: Ban on appearance of tobacco brands in TV and/or films (product placement)
